Name: Abort Mode III
checklistText:
ABORT MODE III
(ABOVE 522,000 FEET)

BOOST INDICATORS MONITORED
ABORT LIGHT MONITORED
ABORT INDICATOR: RED
ANALYZE SITUATION AND DECIDE:
	ABORT OR NOT
ABORT CONTROL HANDLE: SHUTDOWN
OAMS PWR SW: MANEUVER & ATT
OAMS PROP: ON
JETTISON FAIRING COVERS
SEP SPCF SWITCH PRESSED
SEP SPCF INDICATOR: GREEN
MANEUVER S/C AWAY FROM LV
MANEUVER S/C TO RETROGRADE ATTITUDE
COMPLETE CHECKLIST: TR-256 (5 MIN TO RETRO)
COMPLETE CHECKLIST: TR-30 (30 SECONDS TO RETRO)
MANUAL RETRO FIRE
COMPLETE CHECKLIST: RETRO JETTISON
COMPLETE CHECKLIST: POST RETRO JETTISON
NORMAL RE-ENTRY & LANDING INITIATED
